nodes.text: Arcadian Jazz was a thing that could be broadcasted. While recalibrating the space station Starlight Beacon so its signal would not interfere with the navigation of the ridadi, a species of star-locust, Jedi Master Estala Maru sarcastically suggested that he would recalibrate the station to broadcast Arcadian Jazz after Padawan Keeve Trennis asked him an obvious question in response.
